titleStmt.title: A proposal for the erecting of county registers for free-hold lands shewing the great use and benefit of them. By E.B. Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Bohun, Edmund, 1645-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Cumberland, at the Angel in St. Paul's Church-Yard; and sold by Elizabeth Whitlock, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Goldsmiths' Library, University of London.

place.placeName: the Angel in St. Paul's Church-Yard;
